channel.title: Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Assignments
item.description: Collaboration on problem sets is strongly encouraged except where explicitly forbidden. However, each student must independently write up his/her own solution, and students must list all collaborators on their problem sets. Students may not seek out answers from other sources without prior permission. Lec # ASSIGNMENTS SOLUTIONS 4 Problem Set 1 (PDF) (PDF) 6 Problem Set 2 (PDF) (PDF) 9 Problem Set 3 (PDF) (PDF) 12 Problem Set 4 (PDF) (PDF) 13 Problem Set 5 (PDF) (PDF) Problem Set 6 (PDF) (PDF) 17 Problem Set 7 (PDF) (PDF) 20 Problem Set 8 (PDF) (PDF) 22 Problem Set 9 (PDF) (PDF) 24 Problem Set 10 (PDF) (PDF) 26 Problem Set 11 (PDF) (PDF) 27, 29 Problem Set 12 (PDF) (PDF)

item.title: ps1.pdf
item.description: This resource contains questions on fibonacci heaps, least common ancestor and tradeoff in heap operations.

item.title: ps10.pdf
item.description: This resource contains questions on VLSI?design, network?routing, set?basis, load?balancing, finding?a?lifetime?companion, and randomized?strategy.

item.title: ps11.pdf
item.description: this resource contains questions on vertex?cover, Double?Coverage?algorithm, and range?searching.

item.title: ps12.pdf
item.description: This resource contains questions on finding lines crossing a rectangle and standard representation of a Voronoi diagram.

item.title: ps2.pdf
item.description: This resource contains questions on data?structure, access?time?in?splay?trees, and how to construct a suffix tree on multiple texts.

item.title: ps3.pdf
item.description: This resource contains questions on van?Emde?Boas?priority?queue, Fibonacci?heaps, and perfect?hashing.

item.title: ps4.pdf
item.description: This resource contains questions on flows, scaling?algorithm?for?shortest?paths, and augmenting?paths.

item.title: ps5.pdf
item.description: This resource contains questions on blocking?flows and integer?flow.

item.title: ps6.pdf
item.description: This resource contains questions on mincost?flow and linear?program.

item.title: ps7_new.pdf
item.description: This resource contains questions on polyhedra, maximumflow, minimum?mean?cycle, and LP?optimization.

item.title: ps8.pdf
item.description: This resource contains questions on Markov?chains, nonlinear?programs, and scheduling.

item.title: sol1.pdf
item.description: This resource contains solutions of Fibonacci?heap, linked?list, and offline?algorithm.

item.title: sol2.pdf
item.description: This resource contains the solutions on splay tree.

item.title: sol3.pdf
item.description: This resource contains solutions on vEB?queue, Dijkstra?s?algorithm, and hash?functions.

item.title: sol4.pdf
item.description: This resource contains solutions on array creation, scaling algorithm, minimum flow, and minimum flow.

item.title: sol5.pdf
item.description: This resource contains solutions on admissible graph, max flow and matrix.
